name: cpa_firm_id
description: Unique identifier for the CPA firm.

name: contact_name
description: Primary contact person for the CPA firm.

name: contact_email
description: Email address of the CPA firm's primary contact.

name: contact_phone
description: Phone number of the CPA firm's primary contact.

name: address
description: Physical address of the CPA firm.

name: city
description: City where the CPA firm is located.

name: state
description: State where the CPA firm is located.

name: zip_code
description: Zip code of the CPA firm.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the CPA firm was added.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the CPA firm information was last updated.
